result.eng: They violated the Official Languages Act.
result.ga: Sháraigh siad Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla
result.orig: Sháraigh siad Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla

result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ siad Aċt na dTeangaċa OifigiúlaThey violated the Official Languages Act.

result.eng: The court decided that the act breached the constitution.
result.ga: Chinn an chúirt gur sháraigh an t-acht an bunreacht
result.orig: Chinn an chúirt gur sháraigh an t-acht an bunreacht
result.html: Chinn an chúirt gur sháraigh an t-acht an bunreachtThe court decided that the act breached the constitution.
result.ponchtml: Ċinn an ċúirt gur ẛáraiġ an t-aċt an bunreaċtThe court decided that the act breached the constitution.

result.eng: They act as if they owned the place.
result.ga: Iompraíonn siad iad féin ar nós dá mba leosan an áit
result.orig: Iompraíonn siad iad féin ar nós dá mba leosan an áit
result.html: Iompraíonn siad iad féin ar nós dá mba leosan an áitThey act as if they owned the place.
result.ponchtml: Iompraíonn siad iad féin ar nós dá mba leosan an áitThey act as if they owned the place.

result.eng: The Governor is subject to limitations by virtue of the Central Bank Act.
result.ga: Leagtar srianta ar an nGobharnóir de bhua Acht an Bhainc Ceannais
